what: Creation of dummies variables and others variables — dummy_creation
title: Creation of dummies variables and others variables — dummy_creation
text: function used generate necessary dummy variables. can used optimize timetable schedule HEC students, generates necessary inputs. uses excel file contains 13 columns, : - Semester (numerical, e.g. 3) - Day (character, e.g. Monday) - Class (character, e.g. Programming Tools Data Science) - Professor (character, S. Orso) - Credits (numerical, e.g. 6) - First_7_Weeks (binary, e.g. 1) - Last_7_weeks (binary, e.g 1) - Start (decimal hour, e.g. 8.5) - End (decimal hour, e.g. 12.00) - Start_nice (POSIXct, e.g. 1899-12-31 08:30:00) - End_nice (POSIXct, e.g. 1899-12-31 12:00:00) - BA_orientation (binary, e.g. 1) - BA_Mandatory (binary, e.g. 0)
